TopicTitle: How to upload a pictue to show what i am looking for

Articles.Content:
It was suggested to me that a picture speaks a thousand words, when asking for a docking camera (realistic) this would make this amazing game the dogs Cahooners

so I copied and past the pic I wanted looked good, when I submitted the text was there ...NO pic,  any one point me in the right direction plz.

Regards Brian
I think you need to post the pic to a third party hosting website, like Imgur. At least that is what most folks seem to do.
read thru this link

1 hour ago, capt: scarlet said:

It was suggested to me that a picture speaks a thousand words, when asking for a docking camera (realistic) this would make this amazing game the dogs Cahooners

so I copied and past the pic I wanted looked good, when I submitted the text was there ...NO pic,  any one point me in the right direction plz.

Regards Brian

There are several docking-camera mods available already, have you tried them?  Overall I prefer Raster Prop Monitor (and dependencies including Hull Cam) because it brings so much life to the IVA view but there are other, more lightweight ones.

Thanks for that are they easy to install or do you need to be a programmer, where is Raster prop monitor , i'll give it a go, cheers
